name: Fireball Scroll
description: A scroll containing the arcane incantation for the fireball spell. When read, the spell can be cast once.
looks: The scroll is made of aged parchment, with intricate glyphs and symbols inscribed in dark ink. It is rolled up and sealed with a wax seal.

special_effects.spell_fireball: Allows the caster to cast the fireball spell.

name: Iron Battleaxe
description: A heavy iron battleaxe with a double-edged blade.
looks: The iron battleaxe has a long wooden handle with intricate carvings and a sharp double-edged blade made of iron. It has a slight curve and is designed for slashing and chopping.

name: Bronze Longsword
description: A sturdy longsword made from bronze.
looks: The blade of the sword is made from polished bronze, with a double-edged design and a slight curve. The handle is wrapped in leather for a firm grip.

special_weapon_skills.sword_fighting: Grants a bonus to Sword Fighting skill when wielded.

name: Steel Chestplate
description: A heavy chestplate made of strong steel, providing superior protection in battles.
looks: The steel chestplate is a strong and durable piece of armor that covers the entire chest and upper torso. It has a striking silver color and is adorned with intricate designs and engravings.

name: Steel Shield
description: A sturdy shield made of steel
looks: The shield is made of polished steel with a circular shape. It has a large handle in the center for gripping and a reinforced rim for added durability.

name: Steel Plate Armor
description: A heavy and durable set of armor made from steel plates.
looks: The steel plate armor consists of large steel plates that cover the entire body, providing excellent protection. It has a metallic gray color and has a polished surface. The armor is adorned with intricate engravings and has a regal appearance.

name: Steel Plate Armor
description: A heavy armor made from steel plates
looks: The armor is made up of overlapping steel plates, covering the entire torso and extending down to the feet. It also has shoulder and elbow guards.

name: Rusty Sword
description: An old and worn out sword with rusted blade.
looks: The Rusty Sword is a weathered weapon with a tarnished and rusted blade. The handle is worn and cracked, showing signs of a long history of use.

name: Iron Axe
description: A sturdy iron axe with a wooden handle.
looks: The iron axe has a sharp, double-edged blade attached to a sturdy wooden handle. It has a metal guard to protect the user's hand.

special_weapon_skills.axe: Grants a bonus to Axe skill when used.

name: Steel Sword
description: A sturdy sword forged from steel, perfect for cutting through enemies.
looks: The steel sword has a straight, double-edged blade with a sharp point. The hilt is wrapped in leather for a secure grip. It has a simple yet elegant design.

special_weapon_skils.swordsmanship: Increases damage and accuracy with swords.

name: Iron Sword
description: A simple iron sword, suitable for beginner adventurers.
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade with a single cutting edge. The hilt is wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip.

name: Ruby Sword
description: A magnificent sword adorned with a ruby-encrusted hilt.
looks: The Ruby Sword has a long and slender blade made from polished steel. The hilt is crafted from gold and embedded with small rubies, giving it a luxurious and regal appearance.

special_weapon_skils.swordsmanship: Increases damage and accuracy when using swords.

special_effects.fire_damage: Deals additional fire damage on each hit.

name: Warhammer
description: A massive and heavy warhammer, capable of crushing through armor.
looks: The warhammer has a long handle made of solid oak, with a thick, iron head at the end. The head is large and spherical, with several sharp spikes protruding from it.

name: Leather Boots
description: Lightweight and comfortable boots made from soft leather.
looks: The leather boots have a low heel and a sleek design. They are made from supple leather and have adjustable straps for a secure fit.

name: Iron Boots
description: Sturdy iron boots that provide good protection for the feet.
looks: The iron boots are made of solid iron with a smooth surface. They have a thick sole and a rounded toe for extra durability. There are small iron plates covering the front and sides of the boots for added protection.
